resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103367</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103367</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206551</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Skagway: Gateway to the Klondike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Skagway: Gateway zum Klondike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Skagway : Gateway au Klondike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Skagway: Gateway ao Klondike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Skagway: Gateway al Klondike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Skagway: Πύλη στο Klondike</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Skagway: Gateway al Klondike</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines the impact of the Klondike Gold Rush on the development of Skagway, Alaska. This lesson allows students to trace the development of Skagway from a homestead, to a gold rush boomtown, to a permanent city.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft die Auswirkung der Klondike 
Goldanstürme auf die Entwicklung von Skagway, Alaska. Diese 
Lektion erlaubt Kursteilnehmern, die Entwicklung von Skagway von einem
Gehöft, zu einem Goldanstürme boomtown, zu einer permanenten Stadt 
zu verfolgen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine l'impact des précipitations d'or de 
Klondike sur le développement de Skagway, Alaska. Cette leçon 
permet à des étudiants de tracer le développement de Skagway d'une 
ferme, à un boomtown de précipitations d'or, à une ville 
permanente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina o impacto das arremetidas do ouro de 
Klondike no desenvolvimento de Skagway, Alaska. Esta lição 
permite que os estudantes sigam o desenvolvimento de Skagway de um 
homestead, a um boomtown das arremetidas do ouro, a uma cidade 
permanente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina l'effetto degli sbalzi dell'oro di 
Klondike sullo sviluppo di Skagway, Alaska. Questa lezione 
permette che gli allievi illustrino lo sviluppo di Skagway da una 
fattoria, ad un boomtown di sbalzi dell'oro, ad una città permanente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τον αντίκτυπο της χρυσής βιασύνης Klondike
στην ανάπτυξη Skagway, Αλάσκα. Αυτό το μάθημα επιτρέπει 
στους σπουδαστές για να επισημάνει την ανάπτυξη Skagway από 
ένα αγροτικό σπίτι, σε μια χρυσή βιασύνη boomtown, σε μια 
μόνιμη πόλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina el impacto de las acometidas del oro de 
Klondike en el desarrollo de Skagway, Alaska. Esta lección 
permite que los estudiantes rastreen el desarrollo de Skagway de una 
granja, a un boomtown de las acometidas del oro, a una ciudad 
permanente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206551</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103367</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/skagway-gateway-to-the-klondike</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
